item.description: In this tutorial I will show you how to install Icingaweb2 module director.

item.description: In this tutorial I will show you how to nrpe check in Icinga2.

item.title: Install alerta on Centos8
item.description: AIn this post I will show you how to install alerta monitoring dashboard on Centos 8.

item.title: Install alerta on Centos7
item.description: AIn this post I will show you how to install alerta monitoring dashboard on Centos 7.

item.title: Grafana Loki
item.description: Loki is a Prometheus-inspired logging service for cloud native infrastructure. It’s similar to well-known ELK stack but more simple use and is intended to be used mostly Kubernetes.

item.title: Install Prometheus for Gitlab
item.description: Prometheus is an open-source monitoring system with a built-in noSQL time-series database. It offers a multi-dimensional data model, a flexible query language, and diverse visualization possibilities. Prometheus collects metrics from http nedpoint. Most service dind’t have this endpoint so you need optional programs that generate additional metrics cald exporters.

item.title: Nagios Cross Platform Agent
item.description: In this article I will show you how to add Remote Linux machine and it’s services to Nagios Monitoring host using NCPA agent.

item.title: Nagios Remote Plugin Executor
item.description: In this article I will show you how to add Remote Linux machine and it’s services to Nagios Monitoring host using NRPE agent.

item.title: Install Centreon on Centos 7
item.description: Centreon is a free Open Source monitoring software which allows an administrator to easily configure alerts based on thresholds, generate email alerts, add systems to be monitored quickly without the need of configuring complicated configuration files.

item.title: Install telegraf on pfsense
item.description: Install and configure telegraf on pfsense to provides system information to prometheus.

item.title: Install Prometheus with Influxdb storage
item.description: Use Influxdb to as storage for Prometheus.

item.title: Install Nemon with Influxdb storage
item.description: I prefer to use Naemon (a fork of nagos) with Influxdb as a storage for graphical data.

item.title: Install Alertmanagger
item.description: The Alertmanager handles alerts sent by client applications such as the Prometheus server.

item.title: Install Node-exporter
item.description: Install node-exporter to provides detailed information about the system, including CPU, disk, and memory usage.

item.title: Prometheus Install
item.description: Prometheus is an open-source monitoring system with a built-in noSQL time-series database. It offers a multi-dimensional data model, a flexible query language, and diverse visualization possibilities. Prometheus collects metrics from http nedpoint. Most service dind’t have this endpoint so you need optional programs that generate additional metrics cald exporters.
